name: Fire pump isolation valves installed on all pumps
All pipe work tested to min 1200 kpa
Pour concrete plinth for each fire pump
Check height and dimensions as per drawings/specifications
Switchboards in place using suitable fixings to match mounting service No damage to external board has occurred during installation
Ensure adequate pathways exist within board to accommodate all circuits and allow for future expansion
Install and loom in all circuits into correct cabinets
Ensure cable labels match switchboard schedule and construction drawings
Cables are labelled as per specified requirements
Check all tightness of all terminals on all breakers and bars
Ensure minimum 2m Height clearance - To floor or finish above
Ensure safety signage is installed and visible as per plans
All PvC pipes to be fire rated within pump room
FIP commissioned & is recognising fire pumps within the system
EWIS speakers installed as per manufacturers instructions
Final sign off - Fire pumps installed as per the above ITP - Add general photos/comments below
HOLDPOINT - Once all above items have been signed off work may proceed
